title: FM Dar, Saudi counterpart discuss regional situation - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
ISLAMABAD: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced that Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar engaged in a conversation with Saudi Arabiaâ€™s Foreign Minister Prince Faisal bin Farhan on Friday.

The dialogue focused on enhancing the robust and brotherly relationship between the two nations.

The discussion also included an exchange of perspectives on current regional developments, reflecting a shared interest in collaborative progress.

Both leaders pledged to deepen cooperation across various sectors, emphasising their commitment to strengthening bilateral ties.

Published in Dawn, May 24th, 2025
